Sept. 13, 1884 D Wellingborough Allotment Association Contest
Wellingborough Allotment Association Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
wellingborough-allotment-association-contest
None
Rienzi [arr. Round]
Wellingborough, Northants First Contest held in Wellingborough Wellingborough Congregational disqualified for having reed players. Solo cornet contest held after main contest. Four entrants: H Scattergood - Sutton & Hucknall - 1st Place J W Foster - Kettering Rifles Randolph Ryan - Kettering Rifles E Voce - Sutton & Hucknall Reported in Northampton Herald 20th September 1884 5 bands competed
June 9, 2012, 6:05 p.m. May 6, 2019, 9:50 a.m.
